General.Name: California Software Company Limited
General.Description: California Software Company Limited provides software development, business process outsourcing, and IT infrastructure services. It offers Web APP development services; UI-UX designing services; design and development solutions for point of sale platforms; and digital marketing solutions to enhance online presence and drive traffic sales to online businesses, including search engine optimization, app store optimization, social media marketing, and PPC campaign services. The company provides dSPEEDUp eCom, an ecommerce platform for business to-business, business-to-customer, and consumer-to-consumer businesses; dINSPIRA PoS, a point of sale system for small retail businesses; dCHAT, a conversational software; dULTIMA Omnichannel platform that provides an optimized and seamless consumer experience; dFinS, offers financial services and products; dBCTech, creates decentralized networks or applications that built on blockchain to enable various financial services, commerce services, and supply chain management; and dWager that provides user a hyper-casual games, multi-player RPGs, and VR games, games for mobile, PC, and online platforms. It also offers dCTMS, a cloud based, configurable, and end-to-end clinical trials management system platform to manage various aspects of clinical trials; dsafeR, a cloud based and regulatory compliant end-to-end pharmacovigilance/drug safety system; dCliDAC, a clinical data warehouse and analytics console; CS-eTrial, a configurable electronic trial master and remote monitoring platform in an electronic format to organize, store, verify, and review documents, images, and other digital content of clinical trials; and CS- RMS, a clinical trial remote monitoring system. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Chennai, India.

9.Name: Mr. Ramandeep  Singh
